 ** 1989 NFL PRESEASON SCHEDULE **
       (all times Eastern)

 Saturday, Aug. 5

 Sunday, Aug. 6
 Cleveland vs Philadelphia at London, 1:00 (NBC-TV)
 
 Friday, Aug. 11
 Seattle at Phoenix, 9:30 

 Saturday, Aug. 12
 New York Jets vs Green Bay at Milwaukee, 2:00

 Cleveland at Detroit, 7:30 
 Washington at Pittsburgh, 8:00

 Buffalo at Cincinnati, 8:00 (CBS-TV)

 Monday, Aug. 14
 Chicago at Miami, 8:00 (ABC-TV)

 Saturday, Aug. 19
 Indianapolis at Green Bay, 2:00
 Atlanta at Tampa Bay, 7:00

 Cincinnati at Detroit, 7:30
 Pittsburgh at Cleveland, 7:30
 New Orleans at Buffalo, 7:30

 Dallas at Los Angeles Raiders, 9:00

 New York Jets vs Philadelphia at Raleigh, N.C. 8:00 (ESPN-TV)

 Monday, Aug. 21

 Saturday, Aug. 26
 Buffalo vs Green Bay at Madison, Wis., 2:00

 Pittsburgh at Philadelphia, 7:30
 Tampa Bay at Indianapolis, 7:30
 New York Jets at New York Giants, 8:00
 Cleveland at Phoenix, 8:00
 Dallas at Denver, 9:00

 Sunday, Aug. 27

 Monday, Aug. 28
